LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongMeleeDamage.label: melee damage - strong
LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongMeleeDamage.description:
Gene carriers inflict strong damage in melee combat. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene can also serve as a complement to the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>: <color=#4c994c>Strong melee damage</color>.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryStrongMeleeDamage.label: melee damage - very strong
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryStrongMeleeDamage.descript:
Gene carriers inflict very strong damage in melee combat. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene can also serve as a complement to the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>: <color=#4c994c>Strong melee damage</color>.
LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongestMeleeDamage.label: melee damage - strongest
LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongestMeleeDamage.descripti:
Gene carriers inflict strongest damage in melee combat. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene can also serve as a complement to the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>: <color=#4c994c>Strong melee damage</color>.
LanguageData.XMonsters_DevastatingMeleeDamage.label: melee damage - devastating
LanguageData.XMonsters_DevastatingMeleeDamage.descrip:
Gene carriers inflict devastating damage in melee combat. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene can also serve as a complement to the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>: <color=#4c994c>Strong melee damage</color>.
LanguageData.XMonsters_DeadlyMeleeDamage.label: melee damage - deadly
LanguageData.XMonsters_DeadlyMeleeDamage.description:
Gene carriers inflict deadly damage in melee combat. It won't be a pleasant experience if they end up as your enemy. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene can also serve as a complement to the <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>: <color=#4c994c>Strong melee damage</color>.
